items.preText: Andrew Miller at the ground for us: "Bangladesh are just starting to get a bit ragged here. A fair few anxious faces in the very expectant crowd to our left."
items.text: 131kph, shorter length, he's jumping back, surprised by some extra bounce, knocking this down into the off side
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Miller, no run

items.text: missed by Mahmudullah at third man! It was upper cut to third man, Mahmudullah stalled coming in off the rope, misjudging it, and it dropped short. He should have caught that. Or at least got hands to it.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Miller, 1 run

items.text: he works this off the pads behind square
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to van der Dussen, 1 run

items.text: good length, angled in, he gets a thick inside edge onto pad and it rolls behind him
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Miller, no run

items.text: tailing into the pad, he glances this neatly with the angle to fine leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Miller, 1 run

items.text: 129kph, good length, top of off, he's forced to defend off the back foot
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Miller, no run

items.preText: ATJ: "It is time for some "In the arc, out of the park" by Killer Miller!"
items.text: 135kph, too short and he swivels on the pull and whacks it past short fine! Can't deliver that line and length when fine leg is up. Miller just had to place it after seizing on the length
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Miller, FOUR runs

items.text: good length, outside off, he forces this from the crease to point
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Miller, no run

items.text: good length, 134kph, wide of off, he stands up to drive through cover bit drags this off the toe of the bat to long on
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Miller, 1 run

items.text: good length, angled into off, 133kph, he pushed this towards long on but Mehidy whips across to make the stop
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to van der Dussen, no run

items.text: full and tailing into the pads but it's going way down leg despite the loud appeal from the crowd
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to van der Dussen, no run

items.text: 137kph, bouncer, way too high and correctly called. Mushfiqur had to jump up to knock it down
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Miller, 1 wide

items.text: leading edge caught at backward point! Super catch from Mehidy! This flew to him. It was full and angling into middle, Miller tried to whip it through midwicket with hard hands and he closed the bat face as the ball pitched and straightened a touch. It flew off the leading edge, head high to Mehidy at backward point and he clung on with two cool hands and a calm mind!
items.postText: Drinks Huge moment fro Bangladesh as they take a drink. ali: "prowling for the kill.. like tigers." ESPNCricinfo's win percentage dropped from 32 to 28 with Miller's wicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Miller, OUT

dismissal.text: DA Miller c Mehidy Hasan Miraz b Mustafizur Rahman 38 (62m 43b 2x4 0x6) SR: 88.37

items.text: 135kph, tailing down leg, he glances this with the angle to fine leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Duminy, 1 run

items.text: nearly a run out! Mehidy again! It was pushes to cover-point, Mehidy swooped, van der Dussen ran but was rightly sent back, the throw was just wide of the stumps!
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to van der Dussen, no run

items.text: sliced in the air just past cover, and out to deep cover-point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to van der Dussen, 1 run

items.text: shorter length, into the ribs, he knocks this down behind square
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Duminy, 1 run

items.text: good length, 124kph, off stump line, he defends to cover
items.postText: Shashank will step in to take you through the finish
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to van der Dussen, no run

items.text: looks to drill this through cover but gets a thickish inside edge back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Duminy, no run

items.text: eased into the covers for a single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Duminy, 1 run

items.text: gets to the pitch of the ball as he works it to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to van der Dussen, 1 run

items.text: pressure builds, another dot. Looks to force this through extra cover but hits it straight to the fielder
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Duminy, no run

items.text: superb stop off his own bowling, diving to his right off his own bowling.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Duminy, no run

items.text: drifting into the pads, works it to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Duminy, 1 run

items.text: Mustafizur has turned this game bigtime, or has he? Given out and JP Duminy reviews. Cuts back in from outside off on a length, JP is hurried into a defensive stroke which he tries to execute from the crease, but it's the fizz (no pun intended) that does him in. Hit high on the pad but mind you he was rooted to the crease and the ball didn't have much distance to travel. Clear gap between bat and pad, only thing to see was if it would've hit the stumps. Ball tracking says no so the original decision has been reversed. Huge relief for South Africa
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Duminy, no run
